name: ExtractRegionFromImageByMask
description: Extract a sub-region from an image using the bounding box from a label image, with an optional padding radius.

inputs.name: Input Image
inputs.description: The input image from which a region will be extracted.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output image containing the extracted region.

inputs.name: Label Mask Image
inputs.description: The label mask image used to extract the bounding box.

inputs.name: Label
inputs.description: The label value used to extract the sub-region.

inputs.name: Pad Radius
inputs.description: Optional padding radius to be added around the bounding box.

author: ANTs Developers
